title: Workplace Inclusion and Organizational Participation
description: As an IDD community member with part-time employment I want to be valued as a real worker with genuine contributions So that I experience dignity, fair compensation, and meaningful work
content:
Feature: Workplace Inclusion and Organizational Participation
  As an IDD community member with part-time employment
  I want to be valued as a real worker with genuine contributions
  So that I experience dignity, fair compensation, and meaningful work

  Background:
    Given Jordan works part-time at the local public library
    And Jordan's job includes shelving books and basic cataloging support
    And Jordan is a real employee, not just someone in "job training"
    And the workplace_elohim ensures fair treatment and appropriate accommodations

  Scenario: Receiving fair compensation for real work
    Given Jordan works 15 hours per week at the library
    And Jordan's work contributes genuine value to library operations
    When Jordan receives their paycheck
    Then Jordan is paid at least minimum wage for all hours worked
    And the Value Scanner shows Jordan's earnings and care token accumulation
    And Jordan's work is compensated fairly, not exploited as "therapy"
    And Jordan experiences being a valued worker earning real wages
    And Jordan's economic contribution is recognized through fair pay
    And Jordan's worker status is authentic, not symbolic

  Scenario: Performing job duties with accessible support
    Given Jordan is responsible for shelving returned books
    And the library has organized the system for accessibility
    When Jordan completes their shelving tasks
    Then the personal_agent provides visual sorting guidance if needed
    And the shelving system uses color-coding and clear labels
    And Jordan can complete most tasks independently
    And supervisors provide support for complex situations
    And Jordan's work directly helps library patrons find books
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for library care contribution
    And Jordan experiences competence and work satisfaction

  Scenario: Participating in staff meetings as equal colleague
    Given the library holds monthly staff meetings
    And all employees should participate in workplace decisions
    When Jordan attends the staff meeting
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan prepare for participation
    And meeting facilitators use accessible communication practices
    And Jordan can share ideas and concerns
    And Jordan's input is valued alongside other staff members
    And workplace decisions consider Jordan's perspective
    And Jordan experiences being a respected colleague, not just a client

  Scenario: Receiving workplace accommodations as right, not favor
    Given Jordan needs extra time to learn new library procedures
    And reasonable accommodations are legally required
    When new cataloging software is introduced
    Then the library provides extended training time for Jordan
    And instruction is adapted to Jordan's learning style
    And accommodations are provided matter-of-factly, not begrudgingly
    And Jordan's right to accessibility is honored
    And Jordan can perform job with appropriate support
    And Jordan experiences workplace inclusion through accommodation

  Scenario: Building workplace relationships with colleagues
    Given Jordan works alongside several other library staff
    And workplace friendships enhance job satisfaction
    When Jordan interacts with colleagues during work
    Then coworkers engage with Jordan as a peer employee
    And conversations are genuine, not patronizing
    And Jordan participates in workplace social interactions (break room chat)
    And colleagues see Jordan's personality, humor, and contributions
    And workplace relationships are authentic and mutual
    And Jordan experiences workplace belonging and friendship

  Scenario: Advancing skills and taking on new responsibilities
    Given Jordan has mastered the shelving duties
    And Jordan wants to learn more advanced library tasks
    When Jordan expresses interest in additional responsibilities
    Then supervisors take Jordan's career growth seriously
    And the library provides training for new tasks
    And Jordan's capacity for growth is assumed, not denied
    And Jordan can take on cataloging support with proper training
    And Jordan's career advancement is supported like any employee
    And Jordan experiences professional development and growth

  Scenario: Navigating workplace challenges with support
    Given a patron was rude to Jordan about their disability
    And workplace discrimination is unacceptable
    When the incident occurs
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan process the experience
    And supervisors address the patron's behavior
    And Jordan receives support from colleagues
    And the workplace_elohim facilitates dignity-preserving response
    And Jordan's right to respectful treatment is defended
    And Jordan experiences workplace protection and advocacy

  Scenario: Contributing to workplace culture and community
    Given Jordan brings joy and positivity to the workplace
    And Jordan's presence affects workplace atmosphere
    When Jordan greets patrons and helps create welcoming environment
    Then Jordan's emotional labor and care contribution is recognized
    And the Value Scanner records Jordan's culture-building work
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for workplace care contributions
    And colleagues appreciate Jordan's positive impact
    And Jordan's unique contributions to workplace are celebrated
    And Jordan experiences being valued for authentic self

  Scenario: Participating in workplace decision-making processes
    Given the library is deciding new operating hours
    And scheduling changes affect all employees
    When staff input is gathered about the proposed changes
    Then Jordan's schedule preferences are solicited accessibly
    And Jordan can express how changes would affect them
    And Jordan's input is weighted equally with other staff
    And the workplace_elohim ensures Jordan's voice is heard
    And final decisions consider Jordan's needs and preferences
    And Jordan experiences democratic workplace participation

  Scenario: Receiving performance feedback with dignity
    Given Jordan's supervisor conducts annual performance reviews
    And feedback helps employees grow professionally
    When Jordan has their performance review
    Then feedback is delivered respectfully and constructively
    And strengths are celebrated authentically (not patronizingly)
    And growth areas are identified with specific, achievable goals
    And the personal_agent helps Jordan understand and process feedback
    And Jordan's performance is evaluated fairly by actual job standards
    And Jordan experiences professional growth through honest feedback
    And Jordan is treated as a real employee, not a perpetual trainee

  Scenario: Coordinating work schedule with personal life
    Given Jordan has medical appointments and personal commitments
    And all employees need schedule flexibility sometimes
    When Jordan needs to request time off
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan submit the request
    And the request process is accessible and clear
    And Jordan's time-off requests are handled like any employee's
    And the workplace_elohim facilitates reasonable accommodation
    And Jordan can balance work and personal life with dignity
    And Jordan's needs are honored without special pleading

  Scenario: Being recognized for work contributions publicly
    Given the library celebrates Employee Appreciation Week
    And all staff members are recognized for their contributions
    When Jordan is recognized for their work
    Then the recognition celebrates Jordan's genuine contributions
    And Jordan is honored as a valued employee, not a charity case
    And specific accomplishments are named (not just "trying hard")
    And Jordan's work helping organize library is highlighted
    And Jordan experiences authentic professional recognition
    And colleagues see Jordan as contributing peer
    And Jordan's worker identity is affirmed and celebrated

  Scenario: Advocating for workplace accessibility improvements
    Given Jordan notices that new book cart is hard to maneuver
    And workplace equipment should be accessible
    When Jordan reports the accessibility issue
    Then supervisors take Jordan's feedback seriously
    And the workplace_elohim facilitates accommodation discussion
    And the library adjusts equipment or provides alternative
    And Jordan's advocacy improves workplace for everyone
    And Jordan experiences being an active participant in workplace improvement
    And Jordan's voice shapes workplace accessibility
